references.reason: This paper introduces a new model, SAM, which is a foundation for the current work and is directly compared against in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Relax image-specific prompt requirement in SAM: A single generic prompt for segmenting camouflaged objects
references.reason: This paper is directly related to the current work as it proposes a method for task-generic promptable image segmentation, which is the core focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Leveraging hallucinations to reduce manual prompt dependency in promptable segmentation
references.reason: This paper is also directly related to the current work, proposing another method for task-generic promptable image segmentation, and is also compared in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Grounding dino: Marrying dino with grounded pre-training for open-set object detection
references.reason: This paper is important as GroundingDINO is used as a component in the proposed INT model for object detection.

references.paper_title: Skin lesion analysis toward melanoma detection 2018: A challenge hosted by the international skin imaging collaboration (isic)
references.reason: This paper provides a dataset used for the experiments in the paper, which is important for evaluating the model's performance in a real-world scenario.
